participant_1.background:
I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh.
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i have one older sister named mary.

participant_2.background:
School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.
i like watching tv and movies.
Music calms my soul.
I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.

content.text: Hi there! Hope you had a good day.
Hey! I did, thank you! I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.
Oh that's great! What are your hobbies?
I really enjoy watching TV, movies, and reading comics. I also love music.
I love to watch TV and movies too! What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
Me too! I love classic rock.
I also love to grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to grow my own vegetables.
It's a lot of fun! It's also really rewarding to be able to eat fresh, healthy food.
I'm sure it is! I love fresh food.
Yes, I have a dog. He's a really funny guy and he always makes me laugh.
Dogs are the best! I have one too. He's a big goofball.
Me too! They're the best pets.
